name: RepairBot - GGJ 2020
description:
RepairBot is a Global Game Jam game about a lonely robot on a quest to repair himself and his surroundings! Get repairin'--beep boop!

Project by Sohyun An, Jamie Day, George Larkwright, Jamie Sichel, and Plaintain Wang!

Prototyping:

Oh hey, it's got reskinned!
